ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I learned the basic of Indonesian language structure. I also practiced basic comunication.
Learned the basics of the Indonesian language and even about Indonesian culture
I learned a vast amount of Indonesian dialogue and culture
I developed a broad understanding of the Indonesian language as well as insights of the culture and geography of Indonesia.
I learned the basics of how to speak and write Indonesian.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: The course is run very well. It kept the class involved even in the most boring of classes.

Strengths: Professor is Indonesian and very outgoing

Weaknesses: N/A

It is a very fun course and I think that the assignments are an overall good balance of time and difficulty. I think that there is a major weakness in the organization and details of the assignments/homework. There were multiple times that I had little to no understanding of when an assignment was due or how to submit it.
The course is set up very well currently. I enjoyed going to class every day as I was excited to learn new facts about Indonesian culture and language.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Yes I would. The class made me appreciate the language requirement as it exposed me to a language I otherwise would have never even considered learning.
Yes, easygoing language credit that relieves stress but is still a fun atmosphere
Yes. The culture is extremely interesting.
Yes. I would strongly recommend this class to others. Professor Indriyo and assistant Rahmat  were extremely helpful and attentive all semester.

yes! this language course is very interesting to me because it was not offered at my high school. i have only ever taken french and find it very fascinating to learn a completely different language and culture.
